meanings.definition: A geometric figure resembling a rhombus.
meanings.sent1: The sistroid had four equal sides and opposite angles.
meanings.sent2: The jewelry box was in the shape of a sistroid.
meanings.sent3: The sistroid rolled off the table and landed perfectly on its corner.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like a sistroid in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The sistroid stood out among the other shapes with its unique symmetry.

meanings.definition: To resemble a rhombus in shape or form.
meanings.sent1: The new building will sistroid the old one in design.
meanings.sent2: The garden paths sistroid beautifully with the flower beds.
meanings.sent3: The way the clouds sistroided in the sky was quite mesmerizing.
meanings.sent4: His dance moves seemed to sistroid effortlessly with the music.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the sunset sistroided with the calm ocean waves.
